aboutUsPage.title: About WAKAN WEALTH
aboutUsPage.intro: A leading company providing suitable solutions for all business sectors
aboutUsPage.partnership: with the Kafalah program for SMEs
aboutUsPage.experience: We have over a hundred years of experience

aboutUsPage.summary: Wakan's team consists of consultants who have held prestigious positions in the private sector, And have distinguished consulting experience A select and distinguished base of clients with whom they have long-term relationships based on professionalism and mutual trust.Flexibility and broad horizons, To keep pace with local and international changes in the completion of work and communication with clientsProviding, The best service by seeking the needs of clients and providing the best financing, And investment solutions through our agreements with financing agencies (banks financing companies), That serve the client's need with easy terms and the lowest profit margin Wakan embraces a group of experts and consultants distinguished by their speci-alized and accumulated experiences that were, Acquired through their work in the largest international and local professional institutions

restructuringSer.title: Restructuring and Organization
restructuringSer.description: We provide innovative solutions for financial and administrative restructuring through the following steps

steps.assessment: Identifying the reasons that led or will lead to difficulties
steps.restructuring_options: Studying the available options for restructuring
steps.consultation: Providing advice during the negotiation period
steps.completion: Completing the process professionally to achieve the desired goals
steps.market_studies: Supervising the preparation of market and technical studies
steps.transaction_analysis: Studying transactions from all aspects and analyzing strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and challenges
steps.risk_assessment: Assessing the degree of risks surrounding the project and how to mitigate them
steps.funding_options: Setting available financing alternatives and expected returns for each option

projectFinancing.title: Project Financing
projectFinancing.description: Determine the appropriate financing needs Prepare the credit file. Determi-ne the available financing alternatives and the cost of financing for each source. Contact financial institutions, negotiate and review contracts and terminate the contract with them. Obtain financing with real estate or point of sale guarantee for companies and institutions. The value of the financing is deducted from the income of the company or institution.Obtain financing on rented properties such as (residential and commercial buildings, factories, towers, complexes, warehouses, stations and rented lands) and the value of the financing is deducted from the revenue and not from the customer's income. Carry out financing with a real estate guarant-ee, and this is done by mortgaging the property and financing with a real estate guarantee from the customer's income through banks and approved financial companies

mergersAcquisitions.title: Mergers and Acquisitions
mergersAcquisitions.description: We assist investors and decision-makers in prioritizing and meeting their needs in mergers and acquisitions through:

steps.strategy: Developing and implementing a mergers and acquisitions strategy
steps.execution: Completing the process professionally to achieve the desired results

feasibilityStudies.title: Feasibility Studies
feasibilityStudies.description: We ensure accuracy when preparing feasibility studies through:

steps.marketStudies: Supervising the preparation of market and technical studies
steps.projectAnalysis: Analyzing the project from all aspects, including strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and challenges
steps.riskAssessment: Assessing project risks and finding ways to mitigate them
steps.financingAlternatives: Providing financing alternatives and expected returns for each option
steps.financialIndicators: Presenting feasibility study results, financial indicators, and sensitivity analysis
